name: ANCSATUSEHATPWSKIA
title: ANC SATUSEHAT - PWS KIA
description: Implementation Guide for PWS KIA based on SATUSEHAT Antenatal Care Module

resource.name: ANC Identifier Value Set
resource.description: A value set containing ANC episode of care identifiers.

resource.name: Antenatal Care Visit
resource.description: Logical model for antenatal care visits, including assessments, diagnoses, and referrals.

resource.name: Extended Codes CodeSystem
resource.description: Set of WHO-Custom-ANC codes adapted in the implementation guide

resource.name: Primary Care Lab Parameter Code
resource.description: List of LOINC code used in laboratory system based on Jakarta master data

resource.name: Primary Care Lab Value Code
resource.description: List of observation code used in laboratory result value based on Jakarta master data

resource.name: Service Request Codes
resource.description: Codes for various types of service requests, including diagnostics, procedures, and referrals.
